attack-object.name: Exploitation for Privilege Escalation
attack-object.comments: This mapping was scored as Partial due to the medium threat protection coverage to specific (sub-) techniques of MITRE’s ATT&CK framework.
attack-object.score-comment: VM Manager can apply on-demand and scheduled patches via automated patch deployment. This can remediate OS and software vulnerabilities that could otherwise be exploited. Since VM Manager doesn't directly prevent exploitation of active vulnerabilities (including zero day vulnerabilities) this control has resulted in a score of Partial.
